description: Use this application to set up a Control Plane with identity access management to control your Fast Data Runtime with just a few clicks
name: Fast Data Control Plane

users.description: Collection of users of Data Fabric solution

api-gateway.description: Envoy API Gateway to route requests to the correct service and verify the need of authentication
api-gateway.name: api-gateway

authentication-service.description: Use Mia-Platform core Authentication Service to provide OAuth2 compliant user authentication API.
authentication-service.name: authentication-service

files.name: auth.json

authorization-service.description: Use this service to authorize routes to request certain resources, leveraging OpenID Connect and simple user-defined configurations
authorization-service.name: authorization-service

files.name: users-users.json

crud-service.description: Use Mia-Platform core Crud Service to manage different instances of the service.
crud-service.name: crud-service

fabric-bff.description: Backend for frontend communication proxy for Control Plane services and other applications
fabric-bff.name: fabric-bff

files.content:
## GENERIC ##
port                      6379
bind                      0.0.0.0

## MEMORY ##
save                      ""
appendonly                no
maxmemory                 31457280

## REPLICAS ##
slave-serve-stale-data    yes
slave-read-only           yes
files.name: redis.conf

files.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <base href="/mgmt/" target="_blank" />

  <title>Fabric Users Management</title>

  <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="https://www.mia-platform.eu/static/img/favicon/apple-icon-60x60.png" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" nonce="**CSP_NONCE**" href="./assets/style.css" />

  <script type="module" nonce="**CSP_NONCE**"
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/backoffice/bk-web-components/{{BACK_KIT_VERSION}}/dist/bk-loading-animation.esm.js">
  </script>

  <script type="module" nonce="**CSP_NONCE**"
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/micro-lc/orchestrator/{{MICRO_LC_VERSION}}/dist/micro-lc.production.js"></script>
</head>

<body>
  <bk-loading-animation primary-color="#2cb47b">
    <micro-lc config-src="/micro-lc-configurations/config.json" fallback-language="en"></micro-lc>
  </bk-loading-animation>
</body>

</html>
files.name: index.html
users.config.json
config.json
style.css
